summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2125, for the improvement of North and West 79th Street, from Fremont Avenue to 8th Avenue Northwest; and 3rd Avenue Northwest, from West 74th Street to West 80th Street; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21219 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
